author: yaxir137
content:
I have 2 private testnets running on a network - one is Ethereum using PoW consensus and the other is using PoS consensus

i want to create a bridge between them - say i want to move ether, from the chain running PoW to the chain running PoS.

author: yaxir137
content: how can i achieve this? do i have to learn to write a bridge - that will allow interoperability between these two chains ?
